name: Face Pull
how_to_perform:
1. Attach a cable handle to a high pulley system, or use a resistance band with a handle on one end.

2. Hold the handle with both hands, palms facing each other (towards your body).

3. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, taking care not to arch your lower back.

4. Lean slightly forward at the hips and lift your arms to pull the handle towards your face. Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together as you pull.

5. Pause briefly at the top of the movement.

6. Release the handle back to its starting position, avoiding any bouncing or swinging motion.

7. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, focusing on maintaining a controlled and smooth movement throughout.
short_summary: Face pulls are an isolation exercise that works multiple muscles in the upper body.
